name: Warm Lentil, Kale & Potato Salad with Lemon Dijon Dressing
recipeIngredient: 17.6 ounce package of steamed & peeled potatoes or about 15 baby potatoes*

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large pan over medium heat and add olive oil. Cut potatoes into quarters and add to the pan. Season with salt and pepper and cook until crispy and browned, about 12 minutes. Add garlic, thyme and lentils and stir for 2 minutes. Then add the kale, cover and cook for another 2-3 minutes until kale is starting to soften and wilt. Transfer to a large bowl and add dried cranberries and toasted nuts.
Make the dressing by adding all dressing ingredients into a small bowl and whisking until combined. Pour dressing over salad and toss to coat.
